subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms|alt=媄,羙}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|羊|t1=goat, sheep or feathers|大|t2=person|ls=p}} – a person with a headdress of feathers or ram's horn; sometimes considered as an ideogrammic compound ({{zh-l|會意*}}).
